Attacks.Name: Psyshock
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Confused special condition.

Attacks.Name: Telekinesis
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range and line of sight. That character is lifted and placed within range 2 of its current position.

Superpowers.Name: Teleport
Superpowers.Effect: Place this character within range 3 of its current position.

Superpowers.Name: Synchronize
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is targeted by an attack, if the attacker rolls a wild, they gain the same special condition that this character has.

Attacks.Name: Psybeam
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, apply the Stun special condition to the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Escape
Superpowers.Effect: Immediately after being attacked, use this superpower to make an immediate move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Kadabra character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
